meanings.definition: To make a fetish of; to regard with excessive reverence or devotion.
meanings.sent1: She fetishizes her lucky charm, believing it brings her good luck.
meanings.sent2: He fetishizes his favorite sports team, always wearing their merchandise.
meanings.sent3: The way he fetishizes his morning routine is both amusing and endearing.
meanings.sent4: Her obsession with cleanliness fetishizes the idea of a perfect home.
meanings.sent5: The artist fetishizes every brushstroke, treating it as a sacred act.

meanings.definition: To attribute magical or supernatural powers to.
meanings.sent1: The ancient tribe fetishizes the sacred stone, believing it holds mystical powers.
meanings.sent2: Some people fetishize certain objects, thinking they possess special abilities.
meanings.sent3: The way she fetishizes her crystal ball for fortune-telling is quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His belief that the amulet can protect him fetishizes the idea of invincibility.
meanings.sent5: The magician fetishizes his wand, convinced it enhances his spells.
